pullRequest.title: iOS text changes & branding update
pullRequest.bodyText:
Update to placeholder branding.
Text changes.
Date formatting for Activities.
Delete unused Assets and Files.
Minor bug fixes in UI & Consent data-sharing user response.
Fixes for issue #82

commit.message: Text changes, dates formatting & update to placeholder branding.

afterCommit.message: Text changes, dates formatting & update to placeholder branding.

nodes.bodyText: Should this be a variable that can be easily changes across the whole app?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -278,7 +275,7 @@ class StudyListViewController: UIViewController {
 
       if daysLastSeen >= 7 {  // Notification is disabled for 7 or more Days
         UIUtilities.showAlertWithTitleAndMessage(
-          title: NSLocalizedString("FDA MyStudies", comment: "") as NSString,
+          title: NSLocalizedString("App Name", comment: "") as NSString,

nodes.bodyText: Not sure why FDA MyStudies was changed to appName. I think FDA MyStudies or simply MyStudies would be a better placeholder text than app name
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -278,7 +275,7 @@ class StudyListViewController: UIViewController {
 
       if daysLastSeen >= 7 {  // Notification is disabled for 7 or more Days
         UIUtilities.showAlertWithTitleAndMessage(
-          title: NSLocalizedString("FDA MyStudies", comment: "") as NSString,
+          title: NSLocalizedString("App Name", comment: "") as NSString,

nodes.bodyText: why was this changed? I  think as scheduled is a better term.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -77,12 +78,11 @@ enum Frequency: String {
     case .Monthly:
       return "Monthly"
     case .Scheduled:
-      return "As Scheduled"
-
+      return "Aperiodic"

nodes.bodyText: looks like the condition is no longer necessary

@@ -35,7 +35,7 @@ enum API {
     private static let https = "https://"
     static var value: String {
       #if DEBUG
-        return http
+        return https
       #else
         return https

nodes.bodyText: please remove lorem ipsum. It's preferable to leave it empty than this.
nodes.diffHunk:

commit.message: Update overview UI with new background image.
